name: get_geocoding_with_videos
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool geocoding_places.
Tool description: Geocoding places Info with images & videos.
API description: Get complete readable place info in prefered language with related video on Youtube based on given latitude and longitude.

version.description: API version to be used for the request.

lang.description: Preferred language of the content. Defaults to 'en'.
